titleInfo.title: [Map of portion of Ferguson Avenue North and area]

physicalDescription.note: 1 map : colour ; sheet 54 x 52 cm. Map lined with archival paper on verso.

mods.note: "Scale 100 F. to one Inch". The bottom left includes surveyor's signature and date, " Ths. Allen Blyth P.L.S., Hamilton, June 8th 1853". The left edge of the sheet has handwritten note, "No 2 Drawer 6". Streets appearing on the map include: Cannon Street, Gore Street [now Wilson Street], Rebecca Street, Mary Street, Elgin Street, Ferguson Avenue, Nelson Street [now continuation of Ferguson Avenue], Cathcart Street, and Wellington Street.
